data.sentence: The word النُّجُومُ comes from the root ن ج م and is associated with the meanings: to appear/rise/begin, accomplish, ensue, proceed.

data.meanings: to be effaced, disappear, go far away, destroy, be corrupted, wipe out, obliterate, alter, put out, lose brightness, be remote, blot out the trace of.
data.sentence: The word طُمِسَتْ comes from the root ط م س and is associated with the meanings: to be effaced, disappear, go far away, destroy, be corrupted, wipe out, obliterate, alter, put out, lose brightness, be remote, blot out the trace of.
